descriptionHtml:
Make new BlurSnow and remove Snowballs from your Screen
Note:
fxsnowflakesblur not the game itself, there are snowflakes in the short pass in the foreground
New File have size frome orginal Skyrim Textur is ok for low Computer

This Fix Addon is for my favorite Snowflakes in Skyrim by KW71 :)

Real_Snow_Flakes by KW71 can you optional Download (both fit together)
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4252
author: cobrelon
